description: Data are provided by the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene. This dataset shows the number of statewide accidental overdose deaths, impaired motor vehicle crashes, and enrollment in state-sponsored substance abuse treatment programs.

metadata.description: Data are provided by the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene. This dataset shows the number of statewide accidental overdose deaths, impaired motor vehicle crashes, and enrollment in state-sponsored substance abuse treatment programs.

name: Overdose Deaths, Impaired Motor Vehicle Crashes, and Individuals in State-Supported Substance Abuse Programs by Month
